urls.title: Booking Changes – Ryanair Help Centre
urls.description: How do I change my flight? You can change your flight online up to 2.5 hours prior to the scheduled departure time of the original or new flight, whichever is earlier. Changes are subject to payment of a change fee, charged per person per flight. See our Table of Fees for details. You must also pay any difference between the original fare and any fees for optional services (such as check-in bags) paid at the time of the booking, and the fare/fees available when you make the change. Please note that, if

urls.title: Covid 19 Questions – Ryanair Help Centre
urls.description: Do I need to wear a mask on board? Some countries still require passengers to wear a face covering/mask on board when flying in and out of the country. We recommend that, before you fly, you check the latest Covid-19 restrictions and requirements of your destination/arrival countries here. What Covid-19 documents are required for travel? Covid-19 document requirements vary by destination. It is each passengers’ responsibility to be aware of all mandatory travel requirements before they fly, as failure to

urls.description: Do I need to wear a mask on board? Some countries still require passengers to wear a face covering/mask on board when flying in and out of the country. We recommend that, before you fly, you check the latest Covid-19 restrictions and requirements of your destination/arrival countries here. What Covid-19 documents are required for travel? data.text:
@stephenjstokes Hi, we can only inform customers if a flight is operational or not. We can´t provide information regarding needed tests/documents as they are beyond our control. The links below might be quite helpful:  
- https://t.co/UyzQuuYDr2  
- https://t.co/ZOYK6nGn6T  
Ana

urls.title: Covid 19 Questions – Ryanair Help Centre
urls.description: Do I need to wear a mask on board? Some countries still require passengers to wear a face covering/mask on board when flying in and out of the country. We recommend that, before you fly, you check the latest Covid-19 restrictions and requirements of your destination/arrival countries here. What Covid-19 documents are required for travel? Covid-19 document requirements vary by destination. It is each passengers’ responsibility to be aware of all mandatory travel requirements before they fly, as failure to
